successes.title: CA7CH Lightbox
successes.description:
Designed for smart phones, Lightbox lets you snap pictures 
& stream video: sharing the world through your eyes – live & hands-free.

Pledges.description: CA7CH FAN - You’ve joined the CA7CH community and we appreciate your support! You'll be featured on the list of CA7CH backers at ca7ch.com. and we'll keep you up to date on all of our exclusive backer only offers in the future.

CA7CH SUPPORTER - Get a limited edition CA7CH t-shirt and be featured on the list of CA7CH backers at ca7ch.com. Free shipping in the USA. (Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.)

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL • At $70 off list price, be one of the first to get a CA7CH Lightbox in your choice of white or black with 5GB of free lifetime cloud storage. Free shipping in the USA. (Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.)

SECOND ROUND • At $40 off list price don't miss out on this limited quantity offer in your choice of white or black with 5GB of free lifetime cloud storage. Free shipping in the USA. (Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.)

GOTTA HAVE IT - Get CA7CH Lightbox in your choice of white or black with 5GB of free lifetime cloud storage. Free shipping in the USA. (Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.)

KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE COLOR - Get CA7CH Lightbox in a Limited Edition "Kickstarter Green" color with 5GB of free lifetime cloud storage plus an additional free 5GB of cloud storage. This color will be a one-time exclusive on Kickstarter only. Free shipping in the USA. (Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping)

PAIR THEM UP - At $108 off of list price, get 2 cameras for you and a friend at an amazing price in white and black with 5GB of free lifetime cloud storage. Free shipping in the USA. (Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.)

DEVELOPER SPECIAL - Get 2 cameras in your choice of white or black with 5GB of free lifetime cloud storage together with access to the Lightbox SDK (iPhone/Android) package. Free shipping in the USA. (Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.)

FAMILY PACK - At $216 off of list price, get 4 cameras for you and the whole family at an amazing price in white and black with 5GB of free lifetime cloud storage. Free shipping in the USA. (Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.)

CA7CH VIP - Get 5 cameras in your choice of white, black, or Kickstarter Green with free unlimited lifetime cloud storage + 5 limited edition CA7CH t-shirts + an invitation to CA7CH's launch party in NYC this winter 2014. (Includes one airfare roundtrip + hotel stay for 2 nights) *International flight applicable.
